statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:NameServer) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSDNSRecord)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Clean up AWSDNSRecords pointing to other AWSDNSRecords within the current AWS account

statements.query: MATCH (:LoadBalancer)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Clean up AWSDNSRecords pointing to LoadBalancers within the current AWS account

statements.query: MATCH (:EC2Instance)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Clean up AWSDNSRecords pointing to EC2 Instances within the current AWS account

statements.query: MATCH (:NameServer)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Clean up AWSDNSRecords pointing to NameServers within the current AWS account

statements.query: MATCH (:AWSDNSZone)-[r:NAMESERVER]->(:NameServer) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSDNSZone)<-[r:SUBZONE]-(:AWSDNSZone) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
